# PTMsToPathways

This is the supporting package for the projects in the papers listed
below.

Please feel free to reach out with errors, critiques, or questions.

## Installation

Before proceeding, ensure you have R installed. You will also need the
devtools package, which can be installed with:

    install.packages("devtools")

Then you can do:

    devtools::install_github("UM-Applied-Algorithms-Lab/PTMsToPathways")

## Usage

After installation, load the package in R with:

    library(PTMsToPathways)

You can then use the available functions as described in the package
documentation.

## Development & Contribution

If you wish to modify or contribute to the package, we provide
instructions on how to clone our repository, as well as an in depth look
at some our solutions on [our
wiki](https://github.com/UM-Applied-Algorithms-Lab/PTMsToPathways/wiki)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`BuildClusterFilteredNetwork()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/BuildClusterFilteredNetwork.md)
  : Build PPI Network
- [`GetSTRINGdb()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/GetSTRINGdb.md)
  : Get STRINGdb PPI data
- [`MakeClusterList()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/MakeClusterList.md)
  : Build Clusters Based on PTM Data Under Like Conditions
- [`MakeCorrelationNetwork()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/MakeCorrelationNetwork.md)
  : Make Correlation Network
- [`MakeDBInput()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/MakeDBInput.md)
  : Make Database Input File
- [`PathwayCrosstalkNetwork()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/PathwayCrosstalkNetwork.md)
  : Pathway Crosstalk Network
- [`ProcessGMEdgefile()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/ProcessGMEdgefile.md)
  : Process GM Edge File
- [`formatKinsubTable()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/formatKinsubTable.md)
  : Format Kinsub Table
- [`getFuncKey()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/getFuncKey.md)
  : Graphing and Manipulating Cluster Filtered Network
- [`` `%w/o%` ``](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/grapes-w-slash-o-grapes.md)
  : Set difference for vectors using custom infix operator
- [`make.genepep.edges()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/make.genepep.edges.md)
  : Title
- [`ptms_to_cfn()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/ptms_to_cfn.md)
  : Extracts co-clustered PTM and gene network from a cluster filtered
  network object.
- [`remove.autophos()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/remove.autophos.md)
  : Title
- [`setCorrEdgeAppearance()`](https://um-applied-algorithms-lab.github.io/PTMsToPathways/reference/setCorrEdgeAppearance.md)
  : Title
